channel.title: Hiding files in .ZIP folders
channel.description: Okay, I need a way to put hidden files in .ZIP's but make them STAY hidden! Okay, I want to make it so when people download mu client, only run.bat isn't hidden. I want the others to REMAIN hidden. When I put in the hidden files in the zip, it shows up at not hidden, how do I make it so when some one downloads my client, the other files STAY hidden?

item.title: Hiding files in .ZIP folders
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

keo pkz:

Copy ur client make one of them hidden and one of them non-hidden make the hidden client a Rar. and there u go

All I’m left with is a client, a hidden client, and a RAR version of my client. I don’t get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Hiding files in .ZIP folders
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“runeite51, post:1, topic:309021”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=405142.msg2997025#msg2997025 date=1255673301]
You have no idea what it does…
[/quote]
it hides the folder DUDE fuck you I didn’t ask for your shitty criticism please go kill your self this is why this unhelpful community sucks big fat dick, none of you are fucking helpful and always go off topic and criticize every little thing.[/quote]

That is uncalled for and unnecessary.

Read full topic

item.title: Hiding files in .ZIP folders
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“runeite51, post:4, topic:308671”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=405142.msg2995902#msg2995902 date=1255581255]
First you have to ask yourself why you want to do this? There is absolutely no reason to, I hope you don’t think it provides any measure of protection at all in the way of people taking your code, and if you are hiding malicious files, you shouldn’t be.

So why do you want to do this?
[/quote]
The reason why I want to do this has absolutely nothing to do with security. It just makes it simpler for other people to just click run and not ask extra questions on how. Which is why I am also using an auto extractor from winzip. I can’t jar it, that was my very first idea, but I have no idea how to jar a delta client. I can jar other 317 clients like galkon, but so far I have found no guides on how to jar a delta client. So, any ideas on how to do what I came here to learn how to do?

Then again, Kihomura, I may have understood you wrong, could you rephrase what you said?[/quote]
Well people arn’t going to open the run.bat in the zipped folder?

Read full topic

You are the one that is of no use to this community

item.title: Hiding files in .ZIP folders
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:13, topic:308671”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=405142.msg2996935#msg2996935 date=1255663054]

attrib * +s +h

OMG i forgot ALL about that! Okay, let me try it, thanks dude! HOW COULD I HAVE FORGOTTEN!

Do you honestly know wtf that means?
[/quote]

probably not he just dosen’t wanna look like an idiot.[/quote]
run>cmd> attrib +s +h C:\clientfoldername\folderyouwanahidehere

I know what it means.

Yeah, no but when I zipped it, the hidden files via this method didn’t even get zipped, so this doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Hiding files in .ZIP folders
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Zip your class files into a JAR and use a batch file to execute the JAR file.

Note: They can simply extract the JAR file, but maybe they’re retarded

Read full topic
